oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Flatt & Scruggs awards - 1968-04-27 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from Martha White sponsored Grand Ole Opry Show from April 27, 1968. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Flatt & Scruggs (performers), Charlie Walker (performer), Rita Faye (performer), and the Crook Brothers (performers) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Flatt & Scruggs; Rita Faye; Crook Brothers; Charlie Walker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Grant Turner introduces Flatt & Scruggs -- Roust-A-Bout (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Flatt & Scruggs talk and introduce Rita Faye -- The Last Thing On My Mind (Rita Faye) -- Martha White plug (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Earl Scruggs introduces Charlie Walker -- Don't Squeeze My Sharmon (Charlie Walker) -- Grant Turner talks about Flatt & Scruggs achievements and presents them with a plaque from the Grand Ole Opry -- Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs thank WSM -- Grant Turner introduces Robert B. Dale, VP of merchandising at Martha White -- Dale presents Flatt & Scruggs a World's Greatest Flower Peddlers plaque from Martha White -- Grant Turner introduces Efford Burke -- Burke presents Flatt & Scruggs a Martha White birthday cake -- Grant Turner presents accolades to Flatt & Scruggs on behalf of several other individuals -- Flatt & Scruggs express their thanks and introduces the next tune -- Another Ride With Clyde (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Grant Turner introduces the Crook Brothers -- Grey Eagle (Crook Brothers) -- Martha White plug (Grant Turner) -- Truck Driving Man (Charlie Walker) -- Closing statements (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- Dave Overton introduces George Morgan -- Living (George Morgan, Leon Rhodes) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand Ole Opry (Nashville, Tenn.); Flatt, Lester, 1914-1979; Scruggs, Earl, 1924-2012; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008; Faye, Rita, 1944-; Turner, Grant; Martha White Foods;
